20211105154033.content: A lot has changed in this mod. For one, this has changed. But also the whole other things that turned into something amazing. Just kidding, it's just a test and the mod is exactly the same. :) New changelog auto post feature on Discord! Woo!

20211108172204.content: (Fabric only) Fixed a bug where trades would get more expensive on trading a lot.

20211108230405.content:
When breaking placed down mob heads, they now correctly keep their mob head name on pickup.
Fixed grammatical mistake in log.

Added config option to restrict head drops after player kills only.

Updated backend code.

Updated backend code.
Added better compatibility for smaller and modded trees.
Added config option 'automaticallyFindBottomBlock' which allows chopping down an entire tree via a middle block, enabled by default.
Added the config options 'loseDurabilityModifier' and 'increaseExhaustionModifier' to change the amount of durability and exhaustion on chopping down a tree.
(Forge only) Fixed the 1.12.2 version replacing an incorrect sapling type.

20211110190926.content: Added support for all alphabets within the custom names file. E.g. cyrillic and georgian.

20211110194326.content:
Updated backend code.

20211116201159.content: Improved compatibility with modded cauldrons. You can now do the ritual with water-filled cauldrons in Minecraft 1.17.

Synchronized Collective's Fabric and Forge versions to 3.0.

20211122182601.content: The mod has been completely rewritten. It's now much more compatible with other mods and more efficient. Fixes an incompatibility with Quark specifically.

20211122190208.content: Added compatibility with Simply Steel's modded hoes.

20211123095357.content: Fixed falling through a farmland block when un-tilling it while standing on top of it.

20211123101748.content: Improved compatibility with modded poison spiders.

20211123192633.content: Added feature to lower the clock when a potion effect is active, to prevent overlap. Can be toggled with the 'lowerClockWhenPlayerHasEffects' config option, enabled by default.

20211123200606.content: Tree Harvester will now only work with logs of the same type, which is determined on the first log broken. This is to prevent unwanted behaviour with other trees or structures nearby.

20211124130040.content:
The Recursive Update!
With the config option 'enableRecursiveOpening' you can now open multiple door-type blocks when they are connected. By default those which are connected and a maximum of 10 blocks away.

20211126142847.content:
Added two config options.
ignorePaintingsInCycleResourceLocation and showRegisteredPaintingsDebug.
The first allows you to exclude certain paintings from showing up in the cycle, the other to find paintings to exclude via the console and debug lines.
By default the paintings from 
Infernal Expansion are excluded because they should only show up with their separate painting item.

20211127135058.content:

Of course a fully optional dependency.

20220307214259.content:
The big 5.0 update!
Improved the algorithm behind which logs and leaves should be broken. This creates better remaining trees (next to the one harvested) and no more floating leaf blocks.
Huge mushrooms can now be harvested just like trees.
The amount of time it takes to harvest a tree is determined by the amount of logs.
Added config option to increase/slow down fast leaf decay.
Improved the search for a bottom block for 2x2 trees.
Added compatibility with Stack Refill.
The mod now fires the BlockBreak and BlockPlace event.
Added blacklist feature to disable certain axe types from being able to harvest trees.
Overall improved backend code.

20220730124813.content:
Changed the version syntax of fabric mods. Due the subversions (e.g. 1.19 -> 1.19.1) increasingly being different, it's no longer reliable to have the same mod version for all subversions of Minecraft. From now on, there will be a new release for each. This will hopefully prevent confusion and make the whole updating process a lot more reliable for me and you, the user.

The wither rose is now blacklisted by default.
Changed the replacing of flowers to a server runnable.
(Fabric) Improved blacklist compatibility with other mods.

20220925233727.content: Changed the farmland that is being created underneath the crop block from what was around to the vanilla farmland, to prevent duplication of more expensive modded farmland.

20220926162207.content: Now also setting the demand variable to 0 when resetting a merchant's offer.

20220926185922.content: Cleaned up code in preparation for Fabric port.

20220927172003.content: (Fabric) Added entity teleport command callback to CollectiveEntityEvents.

20220927184232.content: Initial release of Followers Teleport Too.

20221001100900.content:
(Fabric) A new major update!
Added support for Mod Menu.
Added custom configuration screen compatible with Mod Menu.
The config now correctly uses the .json5 suffix. This does mean you'll have to update the config files again.
Added extra information to fabric.mod.json.
Added Minecraft loaded event callback.
Added default language loaded event callback.
Dependent mods will be updated to work with Mod Menu too.
(Forge) Added mod icon. Synced versions with Fabric.

20221001121900.content: (Fabric) Updated mixins related to client and server chat messages.

20221001151107.content: (Fabric) Rolled back an update to mixins related to chat functions for now due to a crash.

20221001180716.content: (Fabric) Added backwards compatibility for the previous .json files. They'll be transformed to .json5 when loaded with the new configuration manager.

20221002210332.content: (Fabric) Fixed some config values not being parsed correctly.

20221008134456.content: Fixed a crash when a pair variable was null, due to an incompatibility with another mod.

20221008135508.content: Fixed the events needed for stinger behaviour not being registered correctly.

20221009124004.content:
Fixed one less block being placed when shift-right clicking the beacon.
(Fabric) Fixed not being able to click the beacon from certain angles.

20221009125119.content:
Fixed one less block being placed when shift-right clicking a conduit.
(Fabric) Fixed not being able to click the conduit from certain angles.

20221010134607.content: (Forge) Moved mod icon to the root of the resources folder to prevent a crash when clicking on Collective in the mod list.

20221011135115.content:
Added BlockPos function to get a random position inside an ungenerated chunk.
Added functionality to Collective to parse .schem and .schematic files.

20221016181620.content: Added EntityFunction to force set a LivingEntity's health, above the max health limit.

20221019110156.content:
Updated backend code.
Synced version with local development.

20221019173040.content:
Improved prison generation code to prevent lighting glitches.
Fixed the prisoner's magic explosion doing damage.
Updated mod description.

20221019195442.content:
The Pumpkillager now makes different sounds, depending on the encounter.
Fixed the prisoner not despawning after relog.

20221020165833.content: Changed the input of the Schematic function to work with an InputStream, instead of a file path.

20221020170054.content: Fixed the prisoner camp not generating correctly at the specified coordinates.

20221020185226.content:
Added config option to determine chance of Pumpkillager spawning when a pumpkin is broken, by default 0.1.
The pumpkillager won't spawn anymore when another one is already nearby.
The pumpkillager will only spawn when the pumpkin broken is free, e.g. with air blocks around and above. To prevent it spawning inside a "pumpkin structure".

20221020190951.content: Made the check if the pumpkin is free for spawning the Pumpkillager less strict. It now only needs an air pocket in the NESW directons and above.

20221020221327.content:
Prevented the prisoner of moving during the initial talk.
Added config option to determine if the Pumpkillager should spawn when a player is in creative mode.
Cleaned up code.

20221021193309.content:
Added config option to set the max health of the final boss.
Fixed conversation value.

20221021195643.content:
Fixed config value description.
Updated structure generation code.
Fixed the final boss receiving damage incorrectly.
Added colour to rider names in prison.

20221022182758.content: Fixed an exception due to the prisoner's player target being null.

20221024184402.content:
Tweaked conversation text and timing.
Fixed book whisper messages not being timed correctly in a server.
Changed pumpkin block tag
Added config option to determine how much experience the final boss should drop on death.
The melee prisoner camp guard now steps off horse when the prisoner is shouting.
The first ritual can now only be completed after accepting the quest.
Added sound when the final boss has been killed.
Stopped the prisoner guard from attacking the prisoner.

20221025132747.content:
Added Pumpkillager summoning event, thanks to @noeppi-noeppi on Github for the PR!
Changed when the message scheduler is ran.

20221030120937.content:
Added CommandFunctions to get the raw output of a command.
Added code to get coordinates of nearby biomes.

20221030152211.content: Fixed minecraft version specific biome and village input.

20221030164713.content: Initial release of Biome Spawn Point.

20221030180837.content: (Fabric) Updated ConfigFunctions to work with the new .json5 files.

20221031205810.content:
Fixed the prisoner being targeted by a guard after a reload of the world.
In order to sprinkle some extra pumpkins around the world, to make the Pumpkillager spawn more naturally to players, pigs now have a chance to spawn on top of a pumpkin. Can be disabled in the config file.

20221105181719.content: Added support for Village Spawn Point. With both installed and configured, you now spawn in a village near the chosen biome.

20221105181932.content: Added support for Biome Spawn Point. With both installed and configured, you now spawn in a village near the chosen biome.

20221204225054.content: Fixed dispensers not randomizing flower spawns. Thanks @Tourmi on Github for the pull request!

20221205000933.content: The function which simulates commands now works in a server environment. This fixes Village/Biome Spawn Point not working server-side.

20221205001746.content:
Fixed Biome Spawn Point and Village Spawn Point compatibility.
The mod now works correctly server-side with the Collective 5.17+.
Now logs messages correctly when creating a new world.

20221205002658.content:
Fixed Biome Spawn Point and Village Spawn Point compatibility.

20221205134818.content:
Fixed baby villagers being rendered as adults.
Changed the default config value of chanceForPumpkinBlockToSpawnOnPigSpawn from 0.15 to 0.05.

20221205140046.content: (Fabric) Fixed config values being parsed incorrectly when left empty.

20221205141943.content: Fixed the local PC time not being parsed correctly when containing a   character.

20221205143728.content: Fixed the Fire Resistance effect not being applied when dying with the totem in the inventory.

20221205152805.content: Updated and cleaned up ToolFunctions, to improve compatibility with other mods.

20221205165908.content: Added an option to the function which determines whether a player joins a world for the first time to ignore a non-empty inventory.

20221205205800.content: Updated functions related to saving itemstack NBT data to a file. Added functions to sanitize the input.

20221205210945.content:
Changed the default config file to use NBT data by default.
Improved handling of other mods adding items on startup such as books. They can either be removed completely or re-added after the kit has been set. Configurable via 'addExistingItemsAfterKitSet'.
Fixed some custom books not being saved correctly.
Cleaned up code.

20221206203241.content:
Improved compatibility with other mods by running the starter kit giving logic on the next tick. This will make sure all items given by other mods are caught.
You can use the addExistingItemsAfterKitSet config option to determine what is done with those items.

20221206232232.content:
Added modded compass compatibility.
(1.19) The recovery compass now also shows the coordinates.

20221206234850.content: (Fabric) Fixed beds not being re-coloured correctly.

20221206235807.content:
Cleaned up code.
(1.16) Fixed a nullpointer exception.

20221207212707.content: (Fabric 1.19.3) Changed manure's creative tab to Tools and Utilities.

20221207232834.content:
Simplified how the mod determines whether there's a fish on the line, improves performance.
Cleaned up code.

20221216191854.content: Added an extra check for when the Mojang API is down, used in player head functions, to prevent unwanted behaviour.

20221216220645.content: Updated Collective's schematic code to allow input of structure block nbt schematic files.

20221217214612.content: Added support for entities loaded via structure block schematic files.

20221218150609.content: Added option to the getSurfaceBlockPos function to ignore trees.

20221218154036.content: Fixed Collective not using the minimum world height correctly.

20221218160108.content:
Added the ignoreTreesDuringStructurePlacement config option to improve structure generation inside forests.
Updated backend code.

20221218165720.content: The entitydata NBT file can now attempt to parse a /summon command directly. It does this by adding the id value automatically to the nbt data. This code is only ran when the data can't be parsed initially.

20230104145110.content:
The big 6.0 backend update!
Forge and Fabric (and Quilt) are now contained in one file.

This also means that the two separate project pages for Forge/Fabric will be converted to one (on CurseForge). While having a clean file list! The Fabric project page on CF will remain as a legacy for older Fabric versions.

Both versions use .json5 for their config. Old files are automatically converted.
Forge mods can now be configured in-game via the mod list with the Configure button!

Contains pre-6.0 Forge code to make Collective compatible with the current versions. Will be removed once every mod has received an update. This code is only loaded when a mod requests it, it doesn't affect performance.

Updated backend code.

20230304211204.content:
You can now (temporarily) disable the mod by setting doorOpenTime to 0.
Changed Thread.sleep to use a tick event instead.

20230305123313.content:
Added drawTextShadow config option, enabled by default. Makes the overlay text more readable.
The rendering is now stopped when the F3 screen is open.

20230305161119.content:
Added multiple new config options related to setting the player's spawn point and the structure's position and offset.
This fixes not being able to create underground bunkers.

20230305164543.content: Fixed the spawn point being changed when it shouldn't.

20230305210234.content: Fixed a NullPointerException on world load.

20230306160151.content:
Added a blacklist, generated on first world load, to disable certain animals from dropping manure.
Axolotls, bees and frogs are automatically blacklisted.

20230306163427.content:
Improved how the mod determines what a minecart entity is.
Improves compatibility with other mods.

20230306172835.content: Fixed the flower blacklist not generating correctly for modded flowers.

20230306173818.content: Added support for creating smaller nether portals with soul fire.

20230306175429.content: Fixed modded spreading blocks not being parsed correctly.

20230306181316.content: Fixed incorrectly named wool carpet tag, causing the recipes to not work.

20230306190545.content:
Fixed buttons not always opening double doors.
Fixed double fence gates not opening with sound.
Fixed trap doors rapidly closing when disabled and clicked.

20230310140200.content: Added HashMapFunctions, which adds a custom computeIfAbsent function to add compatibility with threaded dimensions.

20230310140519.content: Changed computeIfAbsent to use Collective's HashMapFunctions. This adds compatibility with threaded dimensions.

20230311172241.content:
This update contains a very big overhaul of the backend mechanics which makes the mod work.
Cleaned up code, segmented core features.
Changed how the mod determines which leaves should be broken. No more leaves being left behind!
Fixed sound events not being handled on Fabric's side.
Fixed more than one mangrove swamp tree being broken simultaniously.
Improved compatibility with modded axes.
Removed the instantBreakLeavesAround config option. You can increase amountOfLeavesBrokenPerTick for the same functionality.

20230312113213.content: Changed the backend code of how the mod opens double doors.

20230312115811.content: Fixed how Collective applies a tag to entities which originate from spawners used by dependent mods.

20230312130925.content: Added KeyMappingFunctions, used to retrieve the private key field from a KeyMapping.

20230312131817.content: Fixed the zoom not working as intended when using custom keybinds.

20230312132351.content: Fixed a NullPointerException due to an incompatibility with another mod.

20230314152344.content: Updated backend code related to double door opening.

20230314155204.content: Fixed the helmet slot not being put on the armor stand with addPlayerHeadToArmorStand disabled.

20230314164013.content: Fixed Player Heads not being generated correctly.

20230314165152.content: Fixed the armor stand being created in the wrong place.

20230323221200.content: (1.19.4 only) Updated Collective to work with the changes to MobSpawnEvent in Forge version 45.0.23.

20230323222232.content: (1.19.4 only) Updated mod to work with the changes to MobSpawnEvent in Forge version 45.0.23.

20230323222424.content: (1.19.4 only) Updated mod to work with the changes to MobSpawnEvent in Forge version 45.0.23.

20230323223205.content: (1.19.4 only) Updated mod to work with the changes to MobSpawnEvent in Forge version 45.0.23.

20230606180417.content:
Improved mod performance.
Fixed trees incorrectly being harvested without crouching.
Fixed a crash during leaf decay due to a mod incompatibility.
Fixed stripped logs being seen as tree logs.

20230607000016.content: Added URL to Modrinth alongside CurseForge.

20230607002131.content: (1.19.4 only) Fixed mob spawns not being canceled correctly.

20230607003156.content: (1.19.4 only) Fixed mob spawns not being canceled correctly.

20230607003415.content: (1.19.4 only) Fixed mob spawns not being canceled correctly.

20230608122601.content:
Fixed pack.mcmeta values.
Updated backend code.

20230609233052.content:
Fixed the chest generating too low when players died on non-full blocks, for example paths.
(1.20 only) Fixed the player's name not being updated correctly on the death sign.

20230609234028.content: (1.20 only) Fixed sign text not being updated correctly when area name is left empty.

20230610001408.content:
Fixed Frog heads not dropping correctly.
Added the Sniffer head texture. 1.20 ready!

20230618134900.content:
Fixed FABFunctions scanning unloaded chunks.
Improved chat mixin compatibility, thanks to @SCPRedMage on Github!

20230619224154.content: Moved ClientWorldLoad event callback to its own class. Fixes a crash in a dedicated server environment.

20230619225622.content:
Improved how the mod determines which leaves should be broken.
Fixed the harvest speed difference not being applied correctly in a server environment.

20230620153015.content:
Fixed helmets not being added to the armor stand correctly.
Improved mod performance.

20230620154410.content:
Added the 'disableMineralDropsWithSilkTouch' config option, enabled by default. It prevents mineral drops from stone mined with silk touch.
Mineral drops can now only happened when stone is mined with a pickaxe.

20230620165040.content:
Fixed particles not showing correctly.
Fixed the player's hand not swinging when placing a blaze rod in creative mode.
Added sound when placing a blaze rod.

20230620171442.content:
Added the 'takeScreenshotTickDelay' config option, to improve compatibility with other mods.
(1.20 only) Fixed the mod not taking screenshots correctly.

20230620175904.content: Fixed /help <command> not working correctly. It now also shows a better looking output.

20230620181029.content: The improved /help command can now be ran from the server console.

20230620193709.content: Giants with helmets on no longer burn in the daylight.

20230620194545.content: Added compatibility with modded player head stacks.

20230622001047.content:
The big 5.0 update!
Lots of code has been rewritten.
Improved performance.
The displaying of areas now works client-side only!
For randomly generated area names, the mod still has to be installed on the server.
Fixed the /areas command not always working correctly.
Added new config options for better control over what the GUI shows.
Added shadow to the area text.
Fixed the game crashing when setting the area range too high.
Fixed the area name sometimes not going away correctly.
Fixed a crash with an empty range input.
Added compatibility with unicode characters.
Added compatibility with modded signs.

20230622003658.content: Fixed config strings losing their trailing spaces when using the in-game config editor.

20230623112127.content: Improved the logic behind opening double doors.

20230624021338.content: Initial release of Persistent Inventory Search.

20230711195401.content:
Cleaned up leftover files.
Added mixins to Forge.
Added global callbacks. The first being a Main Menu Loaded callback.

20230712104812.content: Fixed the new mixin format not exported correctly.

20230712121559.content: Fixed incorrect mixin reference on Fabric. Hopefully for real this time! *Finger's crossed*.

20231029164131.content:
Updated various backend mixin settings.
Fixed Forge global callbacks not working correctly.

20231029170656.content: Updated Extended Bone Meal to work with the latest Collective callback changes.

20231029175824.content: Updated Extended Random Bone Meal Flowers to work with the latest Collective callback changes.

20231101132751.content:
Modded flowers are now loaded into the config, but the target mimic entity is left empty.
This prevents unwanted behaviour with functional modded flower blocks.
They can still be transformed, but would have to be added manually.

20231102195406.content: Added functions related to the merchant menu and screen.

20231102204158.content: Added support for extra modded villager entities.

20231103162337.content:
Updated and cleaned up backend code.
Deprecated (large) List<String> fields in GlobalVariables. Will be removed once dependent mods are updated.
Made the hardcoded JSON fields in Collective editable in ./config/collective/.
Added callbacks for when JSON fields are loaded.
Added function to request JSON file generation by dependent mods. So they'll only generate when needed.

20231104193054.content:
Villager professions will now be shown in the correct localized game language.
Added various config options to specify what and what shouldn't be shown on the villager trade screen.
When custom names are set, the default names will not be used by default. To prevent unintended villager naming. There is a config option to use both.
Updated mod to work with the JSON generation changes in Collective version 6.80.
Added extra support for various modded villagers.
And some other small backend bug fixes.

20231104194127.content: Added support for the JSON file generation changes in Collective version 6.80.

20231104195726.content: Added support for the JSON file generation changes in Collective version 6.80.

20231104200810.content: Added support for the JSON file generation changes in Collective version 6.80.

20231105230103.content: Initial release of Current Game Music Track.

20231106121036.content:
Removed deprecated GlobalVariable fields.
Cleaned up backend code.

20231111153559.content:
The old default custom name list is now correctly ignored, and removed, when loading the mod.
This prevents villagers from accidentally receiving the previously used old custom config names.

20231111165122.content:
(1.20.*) Added official support for NeoForge. Just like Fabric and Forge, in the same jar!
Updated structure and content of mod info files.

20231111193331.content:
(1.20.2) Fixed NeoForge not loading correctly.
Updated mod description.

20231111195831.content: Made some changes to the FakePlayer code and its factory.

20231111213035.content: Changed the backend naming logic. Improves performance.

20231111224832.content: Changed when the JSON file generation runs, so dependent mods can access it sooner.

20231111230139.content:
Improved mod performance.
Changed the backend naming logic.
Fixed names not being applied correctly when spawning in a village.

20231120161956.content: (1.20.2) Updated mod to work with the changes in NeoForge version 20.2.59-beta.

20231120165738.content:
(1.20.2) Updated mod to work with the changes in NeoForge version 20.2.59-beta.
Fixed manure not showing up in the creative inventory.

20231120170208.content: (1.20.2) Updated mod to work with the changes in NeoForge version 20.2.59-beta.

20231120170658.content: (1.20.2) Updated mod to work with the changes in NeoForge version 20.2.59-beta.

20231125155357.content: Adds support with Chat Heads for dependent chat mods. Thanks to @Fourmisain on Github for the PR!

20231128121522.content:
Improves compatibility with modded tools.
Fixes a crash with empty names.

20231128122714.content:
Adds a new config option 'shouldCapitalizeNames'.
Fixes custom names not keeping their formatting.

20231128125925.content: Added support for the Spawn Radius gamerule in the function where Collective determines if a player spawned in a world for the first time.

20231205000628.content: Added the BlockTagsHelper class. It aids in providing support for modded blocks within the multi mod loader environment.

20231205112308.content: Initial release of Ore Discovery Broadcast.

20231206124050.content: Improved mod incompatibility in server environments.

20231206130416.content: Added an extra check if the chunk is loaded to the function that finds surface block positions. Improves compatibility with other mods.

20231207140133.content: Fixes an issue where Collective sets returned BlockPos positions too high.

20231209213311.content: Cleaned up leftover mixin files. Fixes an error message in the console.

20231209220003.content: Added the 'addOreCountToMessage' config option, disabled by default, which adds the vein ore count to the broadcasted message.

20231210000254.content: Fixed some issues related to the in-game config screen.

20231210021112.content: Further improvements to Collective's in-game config screen.

20231210134348.content: Initial release of Global Narration Toggle.

20231210174306.content:
Updated backend code.
Ore blocks placed by players will now not be broadcasted when mined.
Added another config file where a specific colour can be specified for each ore block.
Blocks already counted in addOreCountToMessage will not trigger a broadcast.

20231214010252.content: Initial release of Bareback Horse Riding.

20231214105401.content: Added the mixin config class for pre-NeoForge versions as well, to improve compatibility.

20231215231642.content: Initial release of Thorny Bush Protection.

20231216014644.content: Initial release of Cycle Title Screen Splash.

20231216132547.content: Initial release of No Feather Trample.

20231217122432.content: Added ScreenFunctions related to client-side sign editing.

(1.20.4) Updated the modEventBus field in NeoForge to the new format.
Updated mods.toml and fabric.mod.json data.
Added 'type="required"' line, needed in the latest NeoForge version.

20240227160011.content:
The big 6.0 update!
Without extra configuration, the mod remains the same. '/starterkit set' still exists.
Old starterkit files are automatically converted to the new format.
See the description for examples!

There are (a few) extra features:
Improved tracking to see if a kit should be given. Inside the world folder.
Added support for potion effects to give alongside the starterkit gear.
You can add multiple kits, with an option to let players choose or give one randomly.
Players can choose kits, when enabled, via a custom GUI inventory screen.
If the mod is not installed on the client, players can still choose a kit via commands.
Kit descriptions! Give your instance more of an RPG-vibe with kit backstories.

There are 3 new (inactive) default starterkits, as an example of how the configuration works.
These kits are the inactive folder by default: Archer, Lumberjack and Witch.

Added an alias for /starterkit, /sk.

As an admin you can use the following new commands:
  /sk add (kit_name)
    Adds your current inventory to the active kits.
  /sk set (kit_name)
    Sets your current inventory as the only active kit.

  /sk give <player> (kit_name)
    Give a player a random (or specific) starter kit.

  /sk activate <kit_name>/_all
    Moves kit_name or all kits from inactive to active.
  /sk deactivate <kit_name>/_all
    Moves kit_name or all kits from active to inactive.

  /sk list (inactive)
    Lists all active (or inactive) kits.
  /sk reset
    Resets all tracking. Players receive another kit on join.
  /sk reload
    Reloads starter kit changes from the config folder.

...and probably some more I forgot. Hope you like the new changes!

20240312191948.content:
No code changes, but thought this was the best way to reach everyone.
Windows Defender has had issues this past week with some mods falsely flagging the mod as a "Trojan:Script/Wacatac.B!ml".
This is a false positive. Microsoft has fixed this in their latest Defender update. The solution is to update Windows Defender's definitions.

This can be done via Windows Update, or alternatively via these steps:
1. Open command prompt as administrator.
2. Run the following, without the “-quotes: 

“cd C:\Program Files\Windows Defender && MpCmdRun.exe -removedefinitions -dynamicsignatures && MpCmdRun.exe -SignatureUpdate”

That's it! I wish I could do more. I can assure you there is nothing wrong with the mod. Hopefully in a few days Defender be updated automatically for everyone.

The big 4.0 update!
Support has been added for experience orbs, alongside items.
There is now a config option, disabled by default, to never despawn player-dropped items.
A config file is generated containing each item, where specific despawn times can be set.
There is a reload command for this config file.

20240728195907.content:
Reverted the changes made in Collective version 7.79.
This fixes a compatibility issue during load.

20240809075551.content:
Fixed a wrong version dependency set in NeoForge.
Uploaded a new file to help invalidate caches.

20240815141208.content: (Fabric) Fixed a mixin conflict during load.

20240815151006.content: Updated ScreenFunctions to add a widget to an existing screen.

20240815151212.content: (Forge) Fixed the mod not loading correctly due to a mixin conflict.

20240815153314.content: Added better error handling when generating item drop lists for dependent mods.

20240818181638.content:
Improved mod performance.
Improved mod compatibility.
Fixed a server freeze/crash with huge trees.
Fixed Azalea saplings/bushes not being replanted.
Fixed tree harvesting speed being able to be cheated via uncrouching during the harvest.
Fixed the automaticallyFindBottomBlock not working correctly.

20240928121928.content:
Added support for automatic lowering of the quest list with the BedrockIfy save icon.
Can be disabled in the config.

20240928130314.content:
Fixed quests not immediately generating in a new world.
Fixed the UseItem Shield quest not progressing.
Fixed some potion quests not progressing correctly.

20240928180959.content:
Added a daily quests introduction screen for the first in-game day.
This screen is located inside the quest list, and contains information.
The function can be disabled entirely or the content changed via the config.

20240928224744.content:
Added the 'disableGUIQuestListEntirely' config option.
Added the /dq quests command.

20240929221043.content: Fixed a crash when loading a specific world on Forge.
